name: i just needed a name
description:
Controls:

Press W or S to move depending on the camera's rotation

Rotate the camera by pressing A or D

Press SPACE to jump

Versions: Beta 1.0000 (8/13/2021)
  • Controls shown above.
  • Enemies chase the player.
  • Enemies can also jump! Enemies automatically jump when their X and Z coordinates are the same as the player's X and Z coordinates.
Two powerups:
  • Powerup 1 is shown as a gem that lasts for 25 seconds. When the player touches it, the gem disappears, and the player gets an effect that lasts for 7 seconds. During these 7 seconds, when the player touches an enemy, the enemy gets launched away from the player. The enemy can also touch other enemies because of the effect, causing the other enemy to bounce off the island. This effect is shown by a ring around the player.
  • Powerup 2 is shown as an x that lasts for 5 seconds. When the player touches it, the x disappears, and the player gets an effect that lasts for 5 seconds. This effect causes the player to be invisible to all enemies.
Beta 1.0478 (8/15/2021)
  • Added cooldown timer between waves
  • Added game over state
  • Enemy fall distance is shorter
